title: Adifom SLTN Shoes
subtitle: Men's Originals
description:
When comfort is your number-one priority, these adidas shoes deliver. They wrap your feet in it, from the pockets of foam in the lining to the foam upper. They look good too. Design from the archives combines with modern influences to keep things simple, sleek and super versatile. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

colors: Legend Ink / Legend Ink / Solar Red

title: Retropy E5 Shoes
subtitle: Women's Originals
description: It's time to retire those retro running shoes you've been wearing forever. These adidas shoes have the look of the past plus the comfort of a modern pair. Responsive BOOST cushioning can't be beat when you're spending long hours on your feet. The nubuck upper and leather lining make it clear these shoes are for fashion, not fitness.

title: Web BOOST Running Shoes
subtitle: Men's Sportswear
description: Getting in a few miles or running to the store. These adidas shoes have all the techs to make short-distance training a breeze, and you'll want to wear them on rest days too. The upper has cutouts for airflow, acting like a harness for the stretchy inner bootie. The BOOST midsole is wrapped in 3D Stretchweb to enhance the feeling of energy return.

title: Predator Edge.4 Flexible Ground Soccer Cleats
subtitle: Children Soccer
description:
Swerve. Control. Power. adidas Predator has all angles covered. Hit the pitch and find your edge in these juniors' flexible ground soccer cleats. On top, the soft synthetic upper has a textured finish to help you master the ball. Underneath, a durable outsole digs in to help you dominate on firm ground, hard ground and artificial grass.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.

subtitle: Men's Originals
description: These adidas shoes first graced the hard court more than five decades ago, and now they're all grown up. Still simple. Still effortless. You can pair these shoes with every outfit you own and every outing you're planning. They're always fresh.

description:
These adidas sneakers are living their best life. Rooted in running but with one foot (pardon the pun) firmly in the realm of fashion, the Ultraboost DNA is built for whatever your day brings. adidas PRIMEKNIT wraps the foot for a supportive fit, and BOOST provides instant comfort and endless energy return for a smooth ride.

This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; adidas PRIMEKNIT textile upper; Textile lining; Fitcounter molded heel counter; BOOST midsole; Weight: 11.6 ounces; Midsole drop: 10 mm (heel: 22 mm / forefoot: 12 mm); Stretchweb outsole with Continental™ Rubber; Yarn in upper contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic and 50% recycled polyester; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Almost Pink / Bliss Lilac; Product code: HP2477

The BOOST midsole offers enhanced cushioning, while the durable outsole keeps you grounded.

description:
Make every run count. These Ultraboost running shoes help you go the distance toward your goals with the tech you need for daily training. The midsole is designed for continual energy return, with hundreds of BOOST capsules fused together for a smooth, responsive ride. adidas PRIMEKNIT wraps around the foot to support every stride. When they've logged their last mile, send them back and we'll recycle them into something new.

We're moving toward new ways of returning and remaking. Products made to be remade, not thrown away. Wear it out. Send it back. We'll remake it. A better choice for both you and the planet.

description:
adidas 4DFWD 2 redefines forward motion combining the unique, groundbreaking innovation of a 3D printed midsole with a new upper construction and a Continental outsole for extra grip. With every stride, the adidas 4DFWD 2 midsole compresses forward, reducing braking forces and transforming the impact energy into forward motion. The result is a smooth ride with less stop-and-go pounding on pavement. The Continental outsole grippy rubber outsole provides traction on wet and dry surfaces to keep you going in all conditions, and the adidas PRIMEKNIT+ upper wraps the foot with a new fit that enhances movement.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

description: Open up new possibilities with adidas road cycling shoes – part of the head-to-toe adidas x Parley road collection. adidas' first road shoe made in part with Parley Ocean Plastic proudly wears its commitment to the oceans with a Parley logo on both tongue and sock liner. It's also adidas' first road shoe made with BOA® Fit System for a close, micro-adjustable fit designed for fine-tuning on and off the bike, and easy removal after long rides. Pairing innovation with performance, a fiberglass-reinforced plate transfers power from every pedal stroke into distance. A breathable PRIMEKNIT sock conforms to feet for added support and all-day comfort, with reflective 3-Stripes as standard.

description:
Help your little nature lover spread the love and celebrate the planet with these infants' adidas Forum shoes designed in collaboration with André Saraiva. Saraiva's collection aspires to inspire an appreciation for sustainability. The graffiti-style artwork pairs with his signature smiling Mr. A icon to give your little one plenty of reasons to smile.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
details: Elastic laces with hook-and-loop strap; Synthetic upper; Textile lining; Synthetic outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Cream White / Core Black; Product code: GZ1760

description: Run smooth with these adidas shoes, created using state-of-the-art 3D printing technology, with incredible smoothness, guiding your strides for a more fluid run. The 4DFWD heel is angled to increase impact absorption. Working together with the EVA midsole, this unique design translates into a smooth heel transition at the moment of touchdown while the 3 layered upper is engineered for seamless stretchable support for lateral and linear movements. A rubber outsole provides superb traction for a confident stride. Made in part with recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
details: Lace closure; Engineered mesh upper; Textile lining; 3D-printed 4DFWD midsole; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Cloud White / Carbon; Product code: GY1648
colors: Off White / Zero Metalic / Bliss Orange

description: A '70s style reborn. These shoes take inspiration from iconic sport styles of the past and move them into the future. The shoes craft an everyday look with a smooth leather upper. Signature 3-Stripes flash along the sides. Plush midsole cushioning gives comfort to every step.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Leather upper with synthetic leather details; Rubber outsole; Cloudfoam Comfort sockliner; Soft feel; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Royal Blue / Cloud White; Product code: H02062
colors: Cloud White / Core Black / Cloud White

description: With its high profile and clean design, the Nizza's been an icon for decades. True to the original, the Nizza Hi ADV takes the soul of a classic and adds subtle performance enhancements for skateboarding. The Nizza Hi ADV adds an Adituff ollie patch beneath the suede construction, Adituff toe reinforcement and a rubber toe cap to keep the aesthetic crisp, classic and engineered for skateboarding.
details: Lace closure; Suede upper; Textile lining; Rubber outsole; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Cloud White / Blue Bird; Product code: HP2344
colors: Core Black / Cloud White / Bliss Blue

description:
Remember the first pair of sneakers you fell in love with? Relive the memory every day in these juniors' adidas Swift Run 22 Shoes. Rooted in running but designed for the daily grind, they keep you comfortable with a supportive knit mesh upper and a cushioned EVA midsole. Oh, and they look good too. Win win. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
details: Snug fit; Lace closure; Knit mesh upper; Hugs the foot; EVA midsole; OrthoLite® sockliner; Rubber outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Blue Rush / Cloud White; Product code: GX9207
colors: Core Black / Grey Five / Cloud White

description: The look of speed. The feeling of comfort. These adidas shoes give you a glimpse of the future with their cutting-edge 4D midsole for controlled energy return. You can head out and then stay out. Always in absolute comfort. They not only support the journey, they encourage it.
details: Lace closure; adidas Primeknit textile upper; adidas 4D midsole; Rubber outsole; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Core Black / Cream White; Product code: H04508
colors: Screaming Orange / Core Black / Solar Red
